description: BR-32 is the District Transport Office for Madhubani, Bihar, located in the heart of the Mithila region. This office oversees vehicle registration, driving licenses, and transport permits for the entire district, which shares an international border with Nepal. It plays a critical role in managing regional transport logistics and supporting connectivity across major towns like Jainagar and Jhanjharpur.
address: District Transport Office, Collectorate Building, Madhubani, Bihar
